sources.title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes
sources.description: From IMDb : Captain Hugh (Bulldog) Drummond has just returned to England. As he is driving home in the dark, a young woman jumps out in front of his car. He misses her, but she falls to the ground. As he tries to revive her, he hears a shout for help, then gunshots. As he goes to investigate, the woman drives away with Drummond's car. He is soon able to trace her to nearby Greystone Manor, and when he goes there to meet her, she urges him to help her get out of a desperate situation. Stars: Ray Milland, Heather Angel, Guy Standing, Reginald Denny, and E.E. Clive This movie can also be found here , and here . sources.title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes (1937)
sources.description: Drummond manages to save a woman from jumping in front of his car but she runs away with his car. He traces her and she asks him to help her out of a dangerous situation. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/bulldog-drummond-escapes-1937/

sources.title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes
sources.description: Captain Drummond becomes a prisoner when he intents to protect a beautiful heiress of an espionage organization.

sources.title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes
sources.description: Title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes Summary: Captain Drummond becomes a prisoner when he intents to protect a beautiful heiress of an espionage organization. Directed by: James P. Hogan Actors: Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 22 January 1937 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 Captain Hugh 'Bulldog' Drummond has just returned to England. As he is driving home in the dark, a young woman jumps out in front of his car. He misses her, but she falls to the ground. As he tries to revive her, he hears a shout for help, then gunshots. As he goes to investigate, the woman drives away with Drummond's car. He is soon able to trace her to nearby Greystone Manor, and when he goes there to meet her, she slips him a note urging him to help her get out of a desperate situation.

As he goes to investigate, the woman drives away with Drummond's car. He is soon able to trace her to nearby Greystone Manor, and when he goes there to meet her, she urges him to help her get out of a desperate situation.

sources.title: Bulldog Drummond Escapes (1937) RAY MILLAND
sources.description:
Stars: Ray Milland, Guy Standing, Heather Angel
 Director: James P. Hogan

 Captain Drummond becomes a prisoner when he intents to protect a beautiful heiress of an espionage organization.

metadata.Plot: Captain Hugh 'Bulldog' Drummond has just returned to England. As he is driving home in the dark, a young woman jumps out in front of his car. He misses her, but she falls to the ground. As he tries to revive her, he hears a shout for help, then gunshots. As he goes to investigate, the woman drives away with Drummond's car. He is soon able to trace her to nearby Greystone Manor, and when he goes there to meet her, she slips him a note urging him to help her get out of a desperate situation.
